DOC.brief_title: PK Study Tacrolimus Cyclosporine When Co-Administered With Adefovir Dipivoxil Post-Liver Transplant Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Multi-center , phase 2 , open-label , sequential-cohort , drug interaction study . Cohort 1 subject ( tacrolimus adefovir dipivoxil ) enrol first . Based finding Cohort 1 , decision make whether enroll subject Cohort 2 ( cyclosporine adefovir dipivoxil ) ( i.e. , interaction observe Cohort 1 , Cohort 2 subject would enrol ) . Since pharmacokinetic interaction observe Cohort 1 , Cohort 2 enrol .
DOC.criteria: 1865 year age Greater equal 6 month postliver transplantation Must document stable total daily dose tacrolimus cyclosporine three month . Must calculate creatinine clearance great equal 50 mL/min ( CockcroftGault method ) .
